data.name: Horror Souls
data.detailed_description:
We are just two friendly apes who learned how to make games in our free time and now love to bring our often crazy ideas to live in all kinds of games. Please expect our games to be smaller, raw experiences. We always love to chat with you and greatly appreciate all of your feedback in order to become better game creators. Also if you encounter bugs or any problems, tell us in the Forum and we will do all we can to ensure the best support that a drunken ape could possibly give.



The Soul of the Forest is an ancient artifact which keeps the balance between good and evil.
Only this artifact has the ability to ban evil creatures from our world.
It is your fathers and your task to protect the Soul of the Forest from harm...
A task which you do flawlessly until one day your father does not return from one of his patrols.
As you start looking for him in the forest you cross paths with a masked man who appears to have purloined the Soul of the Forest.
The masked man disappears into the darkness of the night.



- get lost in a mysterious forest and cursed village
- Find the souls of fallen humans
- Break the seals of darkness
- Find many hidden souls in the forest and solve the mystery of the lost forest

data.short_description: Survive the era of darkness. Experience a terrifying horror adventure. Escape the creatures of the void. Solve the mystery of your missing father. Retrieve the Soul of the Forest. Lose your mind in the madness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or better
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX600 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5-4590 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX980 / AMD R9 290 or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670 or better
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X
  • Processor: i5 or better
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670 or better
  • Sound Card: Yes, please.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
